name: 5 Nights at Pizzeria: Animatronics Block Shooter
storyline: Several years ago people loved this innovation about animatronics - robots designed to be a convincing imitation of cute animals. They were created to make service for people in such places like restaurants, cafes and other public places. And they were amazing! But then someone hacked them and implanted special cruel program to kill people. That was a real horror! Life of a simple man turned to a survival game – and unfortunately you’re the part of this game!
summary: You are locked with the legion of cubic animatronics in a very enclosed space and this is the worst nightmare ever! Stay alive as long as possible or die in agony with 5 Nights at Pizzeria: Animatronics Block Shooter game!
